title: [SiteSucker] BibliotecaPleyades - October 2013
description:
==================================== Introduction ===================================

"For those who understand, no explanation is necessary.
 For those who do not, no explanation is possible."

This is an offline copy of BibliotecaPleyades and all the external references

Why download the copy? It is great for offline reading! Also, in case this wonderful
website would be taken down, the gathered information and evidence will not be lost

============================== SiteSucker final status ==============================

* Level             : 15
* Files Downloaded  : 126264
* Files Remaining   : 0
* Errors            : 14343

The common cause of errors is the disappearance of external information source

========================== BibliotecaPleyades_Oct_DVD*.iso ==========================

* Version           : 14 October 2013
* Total size        : 11.61 GB

SHA-1 Checksums:

2ce46636ab7b48312bb527ea8a520dfc50fd47a0  BibliotecaPleyades_Oct_DVD1.iso  3.76 GB
1764ad81665cc00661ce222e6b7af5d2c874d17a  BibliotecaPleyades_Oct_DVD2.iso  4.27 GB
80b36d7238b1475e872d6731f8f3b875c92b6b48  BibliotecaPleyades_Oct_DVD3.iso  3.92 GB

============================== Description of contents ==============================

"Primary" DVD1 - almost everything from "www.bibliotecapleyades.net" website,
except three large folders:

* archivos_pdf (archived PDFs)
* ciencia (scientific articles)
* imagenes_ciencia (images for these articles)

"Additional" DVD2 - three remaining folders above

"External" DVD3 - external references to the pages and files of other websites

DVD iso files could be burned to physical discs, mounted to virtual disc drives
(with software such as WinCDEmu) or opened with archiver software (such as 7-Zip)

After doing that, extract all the contents of each disc to the same folder,
with merging the "www.bibliotecapleyades.net" folders of DVD1 and DVD2 discs

"Oct_DVD_Covers" folder - Lightscribe covers in formats: DiscCover, JPEG, PDF, TIFF
Format quality: DiscCover = TIFF > JPEG > PDF. Unnecessary formats could be unselected
from download list (e.g. you may want to unselect TIFFs, because of their large size)

"SiteSucker" folder - service files: project file, download log and my settings

=====================================================================================
